auth.minLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
auth.requireDigit: The password must contain at least one digit.
auth.requireLowercase: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
auth.requireUniqueChars: The password must contain at least one unique character.

home.categoriesSlogan: Explore our wide range of drinks and find your perfect flavor today.
home.rawmaterialsSlogan: As Bubblehope, you can consume our products we offer to our valued customers as you wish. Which one did you choose?
home.contactslogan: Get in touch with one of our dedicated sales team members to help you with your needs.
home.recomendedSlogan: Discover our handpicked favorites, crafted to delight your taste buds.

aboutus.aboutusDescribtion: At Bubble Hope, we don’t just serve delicious bubble tea  we create  joyful moments in every cup! We started with passion to deliver a unique experience that combines rich flavors, high quality, and friendly service.From the heart of the city, we founded Bubble Hope as a place for people who love discovering new flavors and enjoying cheerful moments throughout their day.We use the finest natural ingredients and prepare every drink with care and love.

wishlist.slogan: Everything you crave… saved at Bubble Hope!

cart.slogan: Ready to check out? The flavor’s calling!

order.slogan: Pick it, tap it, sip the refreshment!

Products.NoProductsFound: No Products Were Found In This Branch Or Category

appAdvertise.doneEasyDesc: Find a store, place your order and get on your way with the bubble hope App

doneEasyPoints.point1: Order ahead and pay from your phone
doneEasyPoints.point2: Join bubble hope Rewards and earn points towards free food and beverages

footer.data: At Bubble Hope, we don’t just serve delicious bubble tea. we create joyful moments in every cup! We started with passion to deliver a unique experience that combines rich flavors, high quality, and friendly service.From the heart of the city, we founded Bubble Hope as a place for people who love discovering new flavors and enjoying cheerful moments throughout their day.We use the finest natural ingredients and prepare every drink with care and love.

training.title: Master One Skill, Work Anywhere
training.desc: Love coffee? One skill can open job opportunities everywhere.With our barista training, you’ll learn the secrets of coffee, brewing techniques, and customer service skills for cafés.Start today… your future begins with a cup of coffee.

slide-advertise.adv1: Sip the flavor . . feel the joy . . share the moment
